example.text: Imagine a veteran coming home with trauma after serving in Afghanistan, and one day their VA benefits are cut off because politicians in DC let the economy crash. We’re headed there if DC doesn’t get its act together and keep us from defaulting.

I also wanted to share a story about one of our veterans from Stockton, Tino, and the hoops he's had to jump through just to get a doctor's appointment. A Few of the Highlights • My daughter Lillian and I talked to CNN ahead of Father's Day about finding common ground in DC on a priority everyone can agree on: supporting our kids.
Our kids’ mental health is at an all-time low. My new bill will bring trained professionals right into our schools to help. ? [[url]]
Oh c’mon. Who steals a veterans’ golf cart? Do better. [[url]]

Criminals have a new way of robbing us - cutting down phone lines to sell the copper wire. It's cutting off access to 911 lines and causing a huge issue for first responders. I've requested the FBI’s help to get this surge of crime under control. [[url]] [[url]]
I was shocked when I learned about the terrible conditions at some dog breeding facilities. We have to pass the Puppy Protection Act to protect dogs from abusive breeders. [[url]]
